resources.string:
Stefani Joanne Angelina Germanotta was born March 28, 1986, better known by her stage name Lady Gaga, is an American singer, songwriter, and actress. 

She is one of the best-selling musicians of all time. 

Her achievements include 13 Guinness World Records, six Grammy Awards, and a Songwriters Hall of Fame's Contemporary Icon Award. 

Outside of her music, she is noted for her philanthropic endeavors and social activism, including LGBT rights and HIV/AIDS prevention. 

By December 2014, Gaga confirmed that she had begun working on her next album, with Billboard reporting that the singer was working with producer RedOne again. Gaga told Entertainment Weekly that the experience with American Horror Story will influence the creative process of her new album, claiming, "I have returned to something I've believed in so much, which is the art of darkness".
